definition: the act of blending components together thoroughly, to mix together different elements
details:
noun
- the act of blending components together thoroughly
= synonyms: blending
- a new word formed by joining two others and combining their meanings
= example: a new word formed by joining two others and combining their meanings
= synonyms: portmanteau, portmanteau word
- an occurrence of thorough mixing
verb
- to mix together different elements
= example: to mix together different elements
= synonyms: flux
- to combine into one
= example: to combine into one
= synonyms: intermix, immingle, intermingle
- to blend or harmonize
= example: to blend or harmonize
= synonyms: go, blend in
